title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning
notes: Can't type capital letters (i.e. player name). This is an issue with all games I've tested so far. Video is letter boxed, but otherwise works perfectly.

title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™
notes: Game started in a low resolution for me. Changing the resolution caused crash. Changing to windowed mode first in the settings menu, then changing resolution worked after that. After that workaround, game runs very well in windowed mode. 1080p/60fps. Xbox360 controller functioned perfectly.

title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™
notes: Runs in some strange resolution at startup, if you try to change it in game, it crashes. So edit .ini file located at [your steam install]/Steam/steamapps/compatdata/102500/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My\ Documents/My\ Games/Reckoning/personal.ini. Got mine running stable at 2560x1080@110+fps

title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™
notes: some sound glitches, unable to change resolution

title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™
notes: Runs fine; resolution is messed up and changing it crashes the game. Changing resolution in config file is the solution.

title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™
notes: Nearly perfect performance 60fps, needs to set resolution manually in /.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/102500/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/My Games/Reckoning/personal.ini

title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™
notes: It is seen that opens the game, the icon appears, but closes it instantly. The game work fine in wine vanilla

title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™
notes: 80 - 160fps, full screen has to be disabled (though it works anyway at native resolution) options -> resolution -> disable fullscreen -> change resolution to whatever -> change back to native

title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™
notes: No issues found after changing the resolution manually, as suggested
I loaded the game and played through a mission on maximum settings.  No issues.
title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™

notes: Everything works perfectly, EXCEPT that, as others pointed out, changing resolutions must be done in windowed mode, not fullscreen. 20 hrs in.
title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 6.0.0)
title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™

notes: It crashed when I set the resolution but after that is runs perfect.
title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™

notes: Widescreen resolutions seem to be a problem on Windows as well as through Proton.  Configure the resolution in the main menu of the game (NOT while in-game with character loaded), exit, re-launch, should have desired resolution showing.  Game seems to work perfectly for me regardless of resolution settings.
title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™

notes: Does not allow typing capital letters, therefore can't connect to EA account (because e-mail is needed and @ can't be typed). Everything else is working fine.
title: Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning™
